page.title: 11DAVID LEWIS CENTRE
page.content:
There are two main areas to be administered. Dr.Stephen Brown is in charge of the medical side. C.Begnett is in charge of the administrative side. His job includes supervising catering, cleaning etc. and trying to give the residents more space and generally improve their lot. There are 240 staff, 295 adult residents and a special school with 104 places. The centre has its own farm with cattle (beef and dairy) pigs and hens. The farm produces food for consumption at the centre and employs 22 patients. There is also a market garden. The residents grow thier own food and prepare it for the table. The residents are accommodated in houses.
